items.title: hololive SUPER EXPO 2026 Holoearth Booth Announcement
items.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
items.content:
Thank you for your support of Holoearth.

Holoearth will be exhibiting a booth at “hololive SUPER EXPO 2026,” one of the largest offline events hosted by hololive production, to be held at Makuhari Messe from March 6 to 8, 2026.

At the Holoearth booth, we plan to screen special footage from past events such as the “Arrival Festivals” and “NePoLaBo Live,” featuring hololive production talents.

There will also be displays where visitors experience Holoearth’s journey so far in a real-world setting, including life-size panels of talents from past Arrival Festival events.

We hope you enjoy the world of Holoearth at hololive SUPER EXPO 2026!

items.title: “Aki Rosenthal Birthday 2026 Encore in Holoearth” Event Announcement
items.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
items.content:
Greetings from the Holoearth Management Team!

On March 13, 2026, a virtual concert titled “Aki Rosenthal Birthday Encore in Holoearth,” featuring Aki Rosenthal from hololive production, will take place in Holoearth.

Virtual Concert “Aki Rosenthal Birthday 2026 Encore in Holoearth”

In Holoearth, become your own avatar and share the same space as Aki Rosenthal. Enjoy an immersive experience from your favorite perspective within arm’s reach.

This event will also feature exclusive MC segments you can only see in Holoearth, along with a special venue, stage production, and cheer items.

Stay tuned for more details!

Aki Rosenthal Birthday 2026 Encore in Holoearth

March 13 (Fri), 2026 at 21:00 (JST)

(Schedule is subject to change.)

items.title: Notice of Price Changes (Feb 20 Update)
items.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
items.content:
Thank you for using the Holoearth service.

In a commitment to a more accessible platform for users, we are sold in Holoearth.

The revised prices can be confirmed in the in-app purchase screen from the effective date.

There will be no change to the purchase price of HoloCoin (Premium).

There will be no changes to content that has already been purchased.

This revision applies only to ; user-made items will not be affected. Maintenance will be performed on . The specific time will be shared at a later date.

Thank you for your continued support.

items.title: NePoLaBo 10-Second Video Contest Results
items.author: HoloearthWebsiteAdmin
items.content:
Greetings from the Holoearth Management Team!

We are pleased to announce the results of the 10-second video contest for the virtual concert “NePoLaBo Live re:VISION Holoearth Live.” Thank you for the many great submissions! All of the entries that conveyed the love for NePoLaBo and the passion of the performance moved the entire staff.

After a careful review, the winning entries that shone especially brightly have been selected and are presented here. Winners will receive a commemorative in-app gift: “NePoLaBo Live Celebration T All Members Ver. (Signed).”

We will contact the winners via X direct message.

Momosuzu Nene Winning Clip

Omaru Polka Winning Clips

レギルスちゅーる(中尉)【雪民】さん An overwhelming display of star power—you can feel the aura from any angle!

The idea to film it behind was brilliant!

See the post here.

Yukihana Lamy Winning Clips

Shishiro Botan Winning Clips

レギルスちゅーる(中尉)【雪民】さん

Holoearth Tourism Agency Special Mentions

らぴす〖雪民〗さん X ID: @lapis5303

The very “Urya-oi!” that became an in-app gesture!

The fact that it captures not just Nene but also Lamy’s dancing really scores points!See the post here.

X ID: This adorable moment between Nene and Botan is captured perfectly!

It is an emotional scene that makes you want to see even more of their close moments.

See the post here.
